You would be surprised how many people do this. I remember doing this back when I first got the game. It was more to play with new friends but every now and then I would jump on a lower level to beat on people who were new. Realized either way I am still really bad at this game but beating up new players is just dumb and rude.

That and now that I find most silver or bronze players easy to beat I don't mind playing vs them every game. And anyone higher may dick on me but at least it challenges me and I can try to learn. But yea OP bad qq thread.

Im not Smurfing, Im from Guild Wars 2 this account is my first


2nd: Ultra Combo Ryze is my name because im a Kjller Instinct fanatic 

3rd: I just want all Spells to be unlocked at lvl 1, so no one has an advantage, like guild wars 2 Pvp

You're obviously smurfing. My lvl 20 smurf plays against high gold and plats now as well, so don't be surprised with being queued with lvl 30s.

That said, I do at least think all runes and masteries should be unlocked at level 1. I understand there should be a way to ease people into the game instead of giving them everything all at once to figure out. Smurfs are not Riot's priority.
